mapper.select: SELECT EXPERT_ID, PRESENTATION, ASSUME, ACCUM_REP, EX_LINK, EX_TAG, PROFILE_IMG, EX_DEL FROM TB_EXPERT WHERE EX_DEL='N'
SELECT EPROD_NUM, EXPERT_ID, EPROD_NAME, EPROD_TAG, EPROD_PRICE, EPROD_DATE, ACCUM_NUM, EPROD_LANG_CODE, EPROD_SUMMARY, EPROD_DEL FROM TB_EXP_PROD WHERE EPROD_DEL='N'

SELECT POST_NUM, POST_CATE_NUM, BLOGER_ID, (CASE WHEN LENGTH(POST_TITLE) > 20 THEN SUBSTR(POST_TITLE,1,20)||'...' ELSE POST_TITLE END) AS POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_HEART, POST_BLIND_YN, TO_CHAR(POST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , POST_PUBLIC_YN, POST_TAG, POST_DEL_YN, THUMNAIL FROM TB_BLOG_POST WHERE POST_DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY POST_HEART DESC
SELECT NOTI_NUM, WRITER_ID, NOTI_RANK, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, VIEW_NUM, PJ_ID, NOTI_CLASS_CODE, NOTI_DEL_YN, NOTI_DATE FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTI_DEL_YN='N'

SELECT COO_NUM, WRITER_ID, COO_TITLE, COO_CONTENT, COO_PEOPLE_NUM, TO_CHAR(COO_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COO_START, TO_CHAR(COO_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS COO_END, COO_DONE_YN, REP_NUM, VIEW_NUM, BLIND_YN, DEL_YN, PJ_ID, TO_CHAR(COO_DATE, 'MMDD') AS COO_DATE FROM TB_COOBOARD WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY COO_DATE
